results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-7f768574d-cnj6d

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-7f768574d-tgh7v Pod/wordpress-7f768574d-pps88 Pod/wordpress-7f768574d-cnj6d], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints; the expected 3 pods are not all ready.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect logs with `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Verify readiness probes in pod spec. 4. Ensure pods are running and healthy. 5. Restart pods if necessary with `kubectl rollout restart deployment [deployment-name]`.
